title: The Bilateral Air Services Agreement between Tanzania, Rwanda, Azerbaijan, Poland  and Sri Lanka
decision_details: - The proposal made by Hon. Nimal Siripala de Silva, the Minister of Transport and Civil Aviation, to sign the proposed Air Services Agreements between Sri Lanka, Tanzania, Rwanda, Azerbaijan and Poland, presently, agreed upon at the official level and  subsequently to take appropriate measures for its entry into force, with a view to formalizing the Air Services between each country, was approved by the Cabinet.
